# ğŸ©º MediScope Dashboard

**MediScope** is a lightweight, client-side healthcare insights dashboard built with Jekyll and pure JavaScript. It visualizes public health data from weather and drug APIs, and includes a secure page editor protected by role-based access control (RBAC).

---

## ğŸš€ Features

- ğŸ“Š Interactive dashboard showing drug recalls, weather-health correlations, and nutrition insights
- ğŸ” Lightweight login system using SHA-256 and localStorage
- ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’¼ Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for restricting access to editor and admin pages
- ğŸ”’ Encrypted credentials stored in `auth.json.enc`, decrypted during GitHub Actions deployment
- ğŸ§± Built with Jekyll for multi-page structure
- ğŸŒ Hosted on GitHub Pages
